amendment.description: Pursuant to H.Res. 256, as amended, the amendment recommended by the Committee on Ways and Means now printed in the bill, modified by the amendments printed in section 3 of H.Res. 256, as amended, shall be considered as adopted.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by the Committee on Rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
